sqlMap.select:
select b.* from ( select rownum rn,a.* from( select unq, title, name, hits, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate from nboard
where $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
order by unq desc) a)b
where rn >=#startIndex# and rn <= #endIndex#

select count(*) total from nboard
where $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
select unq,title,name,content, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate from nboard where unq='$unq$'
sqlMap.update: update nboard set hits=hits+1 where unq=#unq#
update nboard set title=#title#, name=#name#, content=#content# where unq=#unq#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from nboard where unq=#unq# and pass=#pass#
sqlMap.delete: delete from nboard where unq=#unq# and pass=#pass#
